summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the cost basis of securities transferred along with purchase dates. It includes a request for information entry and mentions Richard Kahn from HBRK Associates Inc.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the sender of the email, requesting information to be entered regarding securities.

persons.context: Chad Markland is addressed in the email as a recipient who is expected to assist with the information entry.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is copied on the email, indicating her involvement in the correspondence.
